ygData.subject: Re: Food/rations
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I haven t taken stopwatch in hand to specifically measure, but raw fish doesn t last nearly as long per meal as do fish fillets I prepare in an oven.  40
ygData.messageBody:
--- kale usi <kaleusi@...> wrote:

> I was wondering if there was any real difference to
> the rations/food you can buy or obtain, (like one
> lasts longer or gives a specific benefit) other
> than weight, cost and perhaps personal preferance

I haven't taken stopwatch in hand to specifically
measure, but raw fish doesn't last nearly as long per
meal as do fish fillets I prepare in an oven. 40 Fish
(raw) go much faster than 40 Fish Fillets.

I've never bought food. I've always fished, and now I
even cook'em!

Master Fisher, aspiring baker. :P

===
:D
